chatbot.title: AI Assistant
chatbot.welcome: Hello! How can I help you today?
chatbot.greeting: Hello! How can I assist you with your shopping today?
chatbot.productHelp: We have a wide range of products. You can browse our shop or tell me what you're looking for.
chatbot.orderHelp: For order and shipping inquiries, you can check your order status in your profile or I can help you track a specific order.
chatbot.default: I'm not sure I understand. Could you rephrase your question?
chatbot.error: Sorry, I'm having trouble connecting. Please try again later.
